system_info: SELECT hostname, cpu_brand, cpu_physical_cores, cpu_logical_cores, physical_memory, hardware_vendor, hardware_model, hardware_serial, uuid FROM system_info;
os_version: SELECT name, version, build, platform, arch, install_date FROM os_version;
windows_experience_pack: SELECT key, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE key = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion' AND name IN ('UBR', 'DisplayVersion', 'ReleaseId', 'CurrentBuild', 'InstallDate') AND data IS NOT NULL;
hardware_info: SELECT hardware_vendor, hardware_model, hardware_version, hardware_serial, uuid FROM system_info;
cpu_info: SELECT device_id, name, manufacturer, family, model, stepping, processor_type, characteristics, address_width, current_clock_speed, max_clock_speed, cores, logical_processors FROM cpu_info;
processor_registry: SELECT key, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE key = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\HARDWARE\DESCRIPTION\System\CentralProcessor\0' AND name IN ('ProcessorNameString', 'Identifier', 'VendorIdentifier') AND data IS NOT NULL;
processor_all_registry: SELECT key, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE key LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\HARDWARE\DESCRIPTION\System\CentralProcessor\%' AND name = 'ProcessorNameString' AND data IS NOT NULL;
wmi_processor: SELECT name, manufacturer, description, max_clock_speed, current_clock_speed, number_of_cores, number_of_logical_processors, architecture, family, model, stepping FROM wmi_cpu_info;
system_board: SELECT serial_number, manufacturer, product, version FROM system_info;
memory_info: SELECT device_locator, memory_type, size, form_factor, configured_clock_speed, manufacturer, part_number FROM memory_devices WHERE size > 0;
disk_info: SELECT id, name, disk_index, disk_size, type, manufacturer, model, serial_number, description FROM disk_info WHERE disk_size > 0;
video_info: SELECT name, driver_version, driver_date, adapter_ram, current_horizontal_resolution, current_vertical_resolution, adapter_compatibility FROM video_info;
network_interfaces: SELECT interface, mac, type, mtu, friendly_name, description, manufacturer, connection_id, dhcp_enabled, dhcp_server FROM interface_details WHERE interface NOT LIKE 'lo%' AND interface NOT LIKE 'Loopback%';
network_addresses: SELECT interface, address, mask, broadcast, type FROM interface_addresses WHERE address IS NOT NULL AND address NOT LIKE '127.%' AND address NOT LIKE '::1%';
wifi_networks: SELECT ssid, bssid, network_name, security_type, signal_strength, authentication FROM wifi_networks WHERE ssid IS NOT NULL;
route_table: SELECT destination, netmask, gateway, source, flags, interface, mtu, metric, type FROM routes WHERE destination IS NOT NULL;
installed_programs: SELECT name, version, publisher, install_date FROM programs WHERE name IS NOT NULL AND name != '';
running_services: SELECT name, display_name, status, start_type, path FROM services WHERE status = 'RUNNING' AND name IS NOT NULL;
startup_items: SELECT name, path, source, status, username FROM startup_items WHERE name IS NOT NULL;
recent_patches: SELECT csname, hotfix_id, description, installed_on FROM patches WHERE installed_on IS NOT NULL ORDER BY installed_on DESC LIMIT 20;
bitlocker_info: SELECT device_id, drive_letter, conversion_status, protection_status, lock_status, encryption_method FROM bitlocker_info WHERE device_id IS NOT NULL;
security_center: SELECT antivirus, antispyware, firewall, autoupdate FROM windows_security_center;
windows_defender: SELECT key, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE key = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows Defender' AND name IN ('InstallLocation', 'ProductVersion') AND data IS NOT NULL;
defender_exclusions: SELECT key, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE key LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Exclusions\%' AND data IS NOT NULL;
windows_firewall: SELECT key, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE key LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\SharedAccess\Parameters\FirewallPolicy\%Profile' AND name IN ('EnableFirewall', 'DefaultInboundAction', 'DefaultOutboundAction') AND data IS NOT NULL;
tpm_info: SELECT activated, enabled, owned, manufacturer_version, manufacturer_id, manufacturer_name, spec_version FROM tpm_info;
mdm_enrollment: SELECT enrollment_id, enrollment_type, enrollment_state, management_service_url, certificate_thumbprint FROM mdm_enrollment;
enrollment_info: SELECT key, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE key LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Enrollments\%' AND name IN ('ProviderID', 'UPN', 'EnrollmentState', 'AADResourceID', 'EnrollmentType') AND data IS NOT NULL;
critical_processes: SELECT pid, name, path, cmdline, parent, threads FROM processes WHERE name IN ('lsass.exe', 'winlogon.exe', 'csrss.exe', 'smss.exe', 'explorer.exe') AND name IS NOT NULL;
listening_ports: SELECT pid, port, protocol, family, address, path FROM listening_ports WHERE port != 0 AND port IS NOT NULL;
active_tasks: SELECT name, action, path, enabled, state, last_run_time, next_run_time FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE enabled = 1 AND name IS NOT NULL LIMIT 30;
security_policies: SELECT key, name, type, data FROM registry WHERE key = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\System' AND name IN ('EnableLUA', 'ConsentPromptBehaviorAdmin', 'PromptOnSecureDesktop') AND data IS NOT NULL;
logical_drives: SELECT device_id, type, description, size, free_space, file_system FROM logical_drives WHERE device_id IS NOT NULL;
logged_in_users: SELECT user, host, time, pid FROM logged_in_users WHERE user IS NOT NULL;
battery_info: SELECT serial_number, manufacturer, chemistry, designed_capacity, max_capacity, current_capacity, percent, amperage, voltage, cycle_count, condition FROM battery WHERE serial_number IS NOT NULL;
